mapper.select: -- 返回所有的记录 select * from select_ex
-- 根据id返回选实验记录 select * from select_ex where ex_id = #{id}
-- 根据实验编号返回选择该实验的学生学号 select stu_id from select_ex where ex_id = #{ex_id}
-- 返回最大值 select max(id) from select_ex
-- 获取分分数 select grade from select_ex where ex_id=#{ex_id} and stu_id=#{stu_id}
-- 通过实验id返回选择该实验的记录 select * from select_ex where ex_id = #{ex_id}
mapper.insert: -- 新增选择实验记录 insert into select_ex values(#{id},#{ex_id},#{ex_name},#{stu_id},#{stu_name},#{report},#{grade})
mapper.delete: -- 删除实验记录 delete from select_ex where id = #{id}
mapper.update: -- 打分 update select_ex set grade=#{grade} where stu_id=#{stu_id} and ex_id=#{ex_id}
